text: The University of the Bío-Bío () is a university located in Concepción, Chile. It is one of the universities in the south of Chile. == History == This university was created by the union of some statal universities and was founded in 1947 as the Technical University of the State (TUS). == Faculties == * Business Studies * Architecture, Design and Construction * Sciences * Engineering * Education and Humanities * Health Sciences and Food == References == == Other websites == * University of the Bío-Bío official website Category:Colleges and universities in Concepción Category:1947 establishments in South America Category:20th-century establishments in Chile
title: University of the Bío-Bío
